response.overview: The film explores the personal and professional life of Stella Stevens, one of Hollywood's last starlets. Her career spanned from the final days of the male dominated old Hollywood studio system, through the evolution of the new Hollywood, which coincided with the struggle for women's rights, and human rights of all races and identities, for which she was an advocate.
response.tagline: The film explores the personal and professional life of Stella Stevens, one of Hollywood's last starlets.
response.title: 100 Dates in Dallas
